title: NVIDIA Shield TV - A 3 YEAR User Review! Still The Best Android TV box?
tags: best android tv box for kodi
description: The NVIDIA Shield TV is three years old which is an eternity in the tech world but after all that time is it really still the best Android TV box around?  Well we've been using it for all that time and while there have been some problems, the constant stream of updates and powerful processor have kept it pretty competitive against alternatives.     Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Phanteks Digital RGB Starter:   Phanteks Halos:   SHIELD w/ Remote:   SHIELD w/ Remove + Controller:   SHIELD PRO:   SHIELD Controller:   SHIELD Remote:   SanDisk 64GB Micro SD Card:   Toshiba XS700 External Drive:   LG Nano Cell TV:   Nanoleaf Aurora:     Subscribe    Review unit was provided free of charge by NVIDIA. This video is sponsored by Phanteks. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates!
